title: Deity

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You must select your Chosen One night one, or you will become 4108.
- You will deal an Overkill attack to your Chosen One.
- Your Chosen One will only win if you win.
- Your Chosen One, from the grave, can deal a Basic attack to someone for the rest of the game.
- If you are attacked by your Chosen One, you will become 4108.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to be the last one standing, transform into 4108, or have 4109 win the game.

desc:
Post 4107
*Posting it here before I post it somewhere more serious.*
